title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.21 - Berth usage; measurement of vessels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.21 - Berth usage; measurement of vessels

State Regulations

The manager shall have the right to measure all
watercraft when deemed necessary for the purpose of ascertaining dockage
charges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
